statement.tex: \text{Which of the set operations: }\cup,\\ \cap\text{ or } -\text{ (minus) would make the}\\ \text{following true? Replace the }\star\text{ with}\\ \text{one of the symbols.} \\ \qquad A\cup (B-A) = A\star B
\\ \textbf{What - and where - is }(B-A)?\\ \text{Has }(B-A)\text{ been identified correctly below?}

reason.tex: \text{The following standard results were applied.} \\ \begin{align} B-A &= B\cap A' \\ X\cup (Y\cap Z) &= (X\cup Y)\cap (X\cup Z) \\ A\cup A' &= U\text{ (universal set)} \\ A\cap U &= A \end{align}
